body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: VESPASIAN marble bust ©Granger, NYC / ImageQuest 2021

back.content:
I am known for:
  • being the last emperor in 69 CE
  • becoming emperor in December, 69 CE
  • going on to rule Rome for 10 years total
  • being the founder of the Flavian Dynasty
  • invading Britannia
